heroTitle: The Future is Driven by Sustainability
heroText: At Pirelli, we are committed to building a future where innovation meets environmental and social responsibility. Discover how our tires and production processes contribute to a more sustainable world.
environmentText: In Pirelli, environmental sustainability is at the center of our operations.Here are our key progress in critical areas.
co2ReductionText: We are committed to significantly reducing our global carbon dioxide emissions.
circularEconomyText: We constantly increase the use of recycled and renewable materials in our products.
waterManagementText: We monitor and reduce the water imprint in all our production processes.

ctaTitle: Pirelli: Innovation and Sustainability by your side
ctaText: Sustainability is integrated into every aspect of our business, from research and development to production, and recycling. Learn more about our initiatives.
